slide1.title: Build your e-commerce
slide1.description: Build your e-commerce using proven innovative technologies. (Java EE 7, AngularJS)
slide1.fulldescription:
Jeeshop e-commerce solution makes setup of your online store easy.

It provides store management tools, Jeeshop-Admin, and a set of REST APIs able to handle all front-end e-commerce operations.
slide2.title: Manage your store
slide2.description: Manage effectively your e-commerce using Jeeshop-Admin, from your workstation or a smartphone.
slide2.fulldescription:
Jeeshop-Admin is a responsive designed AngularJS application made to manage efficiently your online store.

It provides you with common store management facilities such as :

  • catalogs management
  • discounts configuration
  • inventory management
  • order tracking
  • customers management
  • newsletters configurations
slide3.title: Contribute
slide3.description: Contribute to Jeeshop, an open-source Apache V2 licensed project.
slide3.fulldescription:
Jeeshop project and source code are available on GitHub.

First release of Jeeshop, jeeshop-1.0-alpha, is under construction.
